DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate single short spinal technique form labour analgesia set expensive labor intensive technique feasible.The study examine safety efficacy two drug combination ( intrathecal morphine+fentanyl v intrathecal morphine+bupivacaine ) randomize control trial .
